name: Luqman Amani
story: Karim Muhtaram is a well-respected and experienced soldier in the OPFOR military. He has served his country for over twenty years, rising through the ranks to obtain the position of Asst. Autorifleman. He is married with children and his family is the most important thing in the world to him. It is said that Karim's dedication to his comrades and his country never wavers, even in the most dire of circumstances. He is widely admired for his disciplined approach and his unwavering loyalty to his fellow soldiers.
